channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cheers for Ben Shapiro
item.description: He has put down an important marker, and anyone vested in the health of the conservative movement should be grateful.

item.title: Comer summons Minnesota officials as House probes massive social services fraud
item.description: The House Oversight Committee is widening its probe into alleged billions in Minnesota fraud, demanding testimony from seven state officials in Januar...

item.title: Mark Cuban says AI allows ‘creators to become exponentially more creative,’ but his advice didn’t land well with people working in the industry
item.description: “All you can see is dollar signs and ‘value’ instead of theft, exploitation, and job displacement,” one creative said in response.

item.title: Stop Calling Cardinal Dolan a Conservative
item.description: Partisan labels do not apply to the former — or to the new — archbishop of New York.

item.title: Michigan Election Integrity Warriors Stop ‘Disastrous’ Ranked-Choice Voting Drive
item.description: '... Our leaders uncovered an army of Michiganders eager to join our opposition once they learned the truth about Ranked Choice Voting,' Patrice Johns...

item.title: Vance unleashes profanity-laced two-word message for critics of his wife Usha
item.description: Vice President JD Vance asserted to UnHerd during an interview that anybody who attacks his wife, second lady Usha Vance, "can eat s---."

item.title: The Productive Path to Affordability
item.description: To make everyday goods and services more affordable, we must unleash the innovation and creativity of the marketplace.

item.title: Social media erupts after Minnesota AG posts about cracking down on fraud: 'You're kidding right?'
item.description: Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison faces mockery after posting video about fighting scammers amid alleged $9 billion fraud scandal in his state.

item.title: Former U.S. Secret Service agent says bringing your authentic self to work stifles teamwork: ‘You don’t get high performers, you get sloppiness’
item.description: “Could you imagine if I brought my authentic New York self to every interrogation I did?” asked former Secret Service agent Evy Poumpouras.

item.title: Lawsuit claims security cameras sold in the US carried undisclosed surveillance risks
item.description: Security cameras linked to Chinese manufacturers face legal challenge as Nebraska targets national security risks in American homes and businesses.

item.title: Sanders blasted after blocking bipartisan kids' cancer research bill: 'Grinch,' 'selfish'
item.description: Kids' cancer drug research was torpedoed for a second time in as many years after Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., blocked the bill during a tense floor ex...

item.title: Trump appoints Louisiana governor to serve as special envoy to Greenland
item.description: President Trump on Sunday announced he is appointing Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry to serve as the U.S. special envoy to Greenland, the vast, semi-autono...

item.title: Billionaire Larry Ellison comes to his son’s rescue, agreeing to personally guarantee over $40 billion to finance Paramount’s bid for Warner Bros.
item.description: Warner Bros. is in the middle of a tug-of-war between Netflix and David Ellison's company, Paramount Skydance.

item.title: The Health Care-Industrial Complex Is Lying About Obamacare Premiums Doubling — And They Know It
item.description: Many reporters have taken KFF’s claim that 'premium payments will double' to mean that total 'premiums will double,' but that's just not true.

item.title: Trump administration puts offshore wind projects on hold, citing mysterious Pentagon national security warning
item.description: Trump has been hostile to renewable energy, particularly offshore wind, and prioritizes fossil fuels to produce electricity.

item.title: New Docs Reveal Shocking Lengths Obama And Biden Went To Protect Hillary Clinton, Get Trump
item.description: Not only did the Obama and Biden Administrations go to great lengths to protect Hillary Clinton, they went to unconstitutional lengths to get Trump.

item.title: Meet the Chanel chief who hires for personality over talent or skills—and the 3 red flag traits she rejects
item.description: Exclusive: As Gen Z fights to stand out in one of the most competitive job markets in decades, Chanel says it’s looking for personality hires.

item.title: Why Hasn’t Trump’s CDC Ditched This Rule That Punishes Neighborhoods For Being Too White?
item.description: Race discrimination is illegal and unconstitutional regardless of 'equitable' motives.

item.title: JD Vance Picks a Side
item.description: Vance will pretend as though he is disinterestedly arbitrating a political dispute on the right, but he’s not.

item.title: Try To Avoid Sending Christmas Letters About Your Perforated Bowel
item.description: We have received multiple-page Christmas letters, which should be punished as the hate crime that it is.

item.title: Judge's conviction in ICE obstruction case vindicates courthouse arrests
item.description: The Trump administration landed its first major victory in its bid to quell anti-ICE resistance with the conviction of Hannah Dugan, the Wisconsin sta...

item.title: Redactions, missing documents in the government's Epstein files ignite suspicions of a cover-up
item.description: The Justice Department's incomplete and heavily redacted release of the Jeffrey Epstein case files has sparked accusations of a Trump administration c...

item.title: Vance offers hints of 2028 ambitions in Turning Point speech
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance did not explicitly declare his intentions to run for president in 2028 at Turning Point Action's AmericaFest on Sunday, but ...

item.title: Republicans Still Crave the Mainstream Media’s Affection
item.description: What else are we to infer from the Vanity Fair episode?

item.title: ICE says an agent fired shots at a migrant who hit him and another agent with his SUV in Minnesota
item.description: An Immigration and Customs Enforcement agent fired shots Sunday at a Cuban immigrant living in the U.S. illegally after the man struck the agent and a...

item.title: Momentum Investing: A Stronger, More Resilient Framework for Long-Term Allocators

item.description: Investors are revisiting insurance-linked securities for yield, diversification, and resilience amid rising catastrophe risk. The post The Growth Stor...

item.title: Winners and Losers in a World Without Quarterly Earnings
